name: Steal Years, Greater
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Blood of the Night © 2012, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (a handful of ash)
text: This spell functions like steal years, except you drain 1d6 years per two caster levels (maximum 10d6).
text_zh: 此法术如同窃取流年(Steal years)般作用，除了你每两个施法者等级吸取1d6年(最大10d6)。
